name: monaco-editor-typescript-locales
description: A utility to translate diagnostic messages from the Monaco Editor TypeScript worker into different locales
author: Elias Mangoro

scripts.build:code: echo 'Building code...' && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs && mv ./dist/index.js ./dist/index.cjs && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build: npm run build:code && npm run build:locales
scripts.prepublish:base: echo 'Making sure TypeScript is up to date...' && npm run update:ts && npm run lint && npm run build

peerDependenciesNotes.monaco-editor: Minimum v0.22.0 because that is when the #onDidChangeMarkers method was introduced which this package relies on.
